------=_NextPart_000_435e_3198_5d80
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1; format=flowed

Melchana was now running as she neared the main gate of the base.

Melchana:
Prophecy, open the door!

The computer opened the door as commanded. Outside, Daemos had disembarked 
from the Hellgate.

Melchana:
So, you still fly this metal bird?

Daemos, happy to see her again, grinned:
Yes. You know that is the only thing that can remind me of the pleasure of 
piloting since I have been reformatted. How are you, Mel?

She frowned slightly as he used her nickname. He surely knew about what he 
had done to her... She would not forget, though.

Melchana:
Fine... but you know me... I could use a fight... (her tone was cold)

Daemos:
And how did the landing happened? Was it a total success?

Melchana:
We lost the reformatting cannon, but everything else was a success. By the 
way, some robots joined us. I told them to join me here, it should not be 
long.

<html><div style='background-color:'><DIV>The Hellgate finally arrived to the Shadow Destiny. Daemos, although somewhat regretful of not being able to fight in the IGL, was cheering at the chance to meet his old friends.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Daemos:</DIV>
<DIV>Prophets, Lieutenant Daemos reporting. I look forward to seeing you in a few minutes!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Melchana, who had been greeting the four new members in her own way, heard Daemos's transmission on the main speakers (who, by the way, were techno-organic palmtree leaves). She had long waited to see him.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Melchana:</DIV>
<DIV>Alright, you metalheads! You will follow me. I will introduce you to the lieutenant. Move your butts!!!</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>She started walking fast, not really caring about her brother's orders about this or the troops she'll train.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Belthassan:</DIV>
<DIV>Hot-head... (he sighed) Lieutenant Daemos, it is good to have you back. Melchana has already "volunteered" herself to meet her, needless to say, without my authorization... Anyhow, welcome back to the Tripredacus!</DIV></div><br clear=all><hr>T�l�chargez MSN Explorer gratuitement � l'adresse <a href='http://go.msn.com/bql/hmtag_itl_FR.asp'>http://explorer.msn.com</a>
